Package org.oddjob.monitor.view

Explorer View Components.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailView
    The detail view component of the monitor.
    ExplorerComponent
    The tree view.
    ExplorerEditActions
    A Set of edit actions that contribute to the menu and become enabled/disabled dependent on job selection.
    ExplorerJobActions
    Group the Job Actions for Explorer.
    JobSwingAction  
    JobTreeCellRenderer
    Display the icon in the job tree.
    LogTextPanel  
    MonitorMenuBar
    Implementation of the monitor menu bar.
    PropertyPanel
    The Tab Panel for properties.
    PropertyTableModel
    Model for a table to display properties.
    StatePanel
